Comments.Message: If I load from Armory and do an optimize I don't get any error. Can you post the specific character file where you're having problem or provide any additional information on what changes you made beside loading from armory?
Added attachment for local character file that is being used.

I have this very same issue.  One thing I noted was that before I load my character (from saved xml file or from armory) the items list on the right has gear ratings and graphs, once I load my char all the ratings and graphs drop to 0.  Mousing over the items gives the correct stat values, but the rawr derived rating is 0.
